item.title: Terms & Conditions
item.description: 1. Definitions We collect certain identifying personal data when you sign up to our Service such as your name, email address, PayPal address (if different from email address), and telephone number. The personal data we collect from you is disclosed only in accordance with our Terms of Service and/or this Privacy Policy.Conclude collects Slack account and access information from Users for the purposes of connecting to the Slack API and to authenticate access to information on the Conclude website.

Jian Xu, Shuo Wan, Yinchuan Li, Zhilin Chen, yunfeng shao, Zhitang Chen, Shao-Lun Huang Towards Federated Learning with on-device Training and Communication in 8-bit Floating Point.

item.title: Call for Submissions
item.description: Workshop Scope We invite paper submissions that have not been published, falling in but not limited to the following topics. Topic 1: GenAI use cases. For example, surveys of GenAI in healthcare, methodologies of using GenAI for data synthesis, simulation (e.g., digital twins), preliminary study, improving diagnosis accuracy, treatment assistance, and digital therapies. Topic 2: Trustworthiness and risks. For example, novel benchmarks of GenAI safety in specific or general health use cases, potential misuse, safeguarding techniques, reliability, and ethical disparities.

item.title: Organizers
item.description: Workshop Committees Junyuan Hong, Michigan State University
